metadata.name: !!Mod Config Menu Chinese
metadata.description:
这是Mod Config Menu的中文版本（中文字体+翻译api支持） This is the Chinese version of Mod Config Menu. If you don't speak Chinese, don't use it. [strike]No new features will be added to this mod, but [/strike]if someone else maintains the original version of MCM, I may follow in to ensure compatibility.
Chinese font support is added. The translation API is added to the original logic.
Original mod link (thanks to the original author piber): https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1603631350
I'm not the original author. Sorry but I don't have enough time to maintain the functions. Please don't ask anything other than the Chinese version here.
